bill.title: An Act to Provide Funds to the Malaga 1912 Scholarship Fund

title.expected: An Act to Provide Funds to the Malaga 1912 Scholarship Fund
title.actual: An Act to Provide Funds to the Malaga 1912 Scholarship Fund

committee.actual: Education and Cultural Affairs suggested and ordered

title.expected: An Act to Provide Funds to the Malaga 1912 Scholarship Fund
title.actual: An Act to Provide Funds to the Malaga 1912 Scholarship Fund

changes: Added whitespace normalization before regex matching
Improved fallback to extract bill_id from separate components (session + LD number)
Better detection of ordinal session format (131st, 132nd, etc.)
Added zero-padding logic for LD numbers
_extract_bill_id.impact: Now extracts from separated components instead of only combined format

changes: Added whitespace normalization on first 1000 chars
Ordinal format pattern more robust (131st, 132nd, etc.)
Better handling of line breaks in 'MAINE LEGISLATURE'
Added simpler pattern for comma-separated names in cosponsorship
Better handling of different representative prefixes
Increased search window from 2000 to 2500 chars
_extract_sponsors.impact: Extracts all 8 sponsors vs 0 in baseline

changes: Proper delimiter using trailing keywords (suggested, ordered, referred, assigned)
_extract_committee.impact: Removes extraneous trailing text, properly delimits committee name

changes: Whitespace normalization enables month pattern matching
Better handling of contextual phrases like 'House of Representatives,'
_extract_date.impact: Successfully extracts dates from full contextual phrases

root_causes_addressed.bill_id: Pattern-only approach failed; added component extraction fallback
root_causes_addressed.session: Line breaks broke regex; added whitespace normalization
root_causes_addressed.sponsors: Multi-line format + comma separators broke simple patterns; added multiple complementary patterns
root_causes_addressed.committee: Greedy pattern captured trailing text; added non-greedy matching with lookahead
root_causes_addressed.introduced_date: Context-dependent pattern; whitespace normalization enables broader pattern matching
